headline: Sr. Software Engineer | Quantitative Engineer
professionalSummary: Sr. software engineer with 8+ years of experience designing and scaling distributed systems, real-time data pipelines, and high-throughput APIs. Proven track record at Amazon and startups building fault-tolerant infrastructure, optimizing latency, and delivering production systems handling millions of transactions daily. Experienced in event-driven architectures, large-scale data processing, and performance-sensitive systems. Passionate about applying systems expertise to quantitative trading and financial engineering, bridging infrastructure with research and execution.
